name: NSW Flood Data Portal
description: A platform for sharing key flood data within government and with stakeholders, including data from flood projects under the NSW Floodplain Management Program. Data from government projects can be uploaded by registered users for secure storage and sharing. The portal does not contain the complete catalogue of flood projects carried out in NSW. Local councils remain the primary source of flood information for their service areas.
owner_name: NSW State Emergency Service and NSW Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water
